answers.answer: Also on my legs they are really blotchy?
My doctor says that I'm eating too much salt when I swell up like that. Try to back off on the amount of salt and drink more water.
If you worried call your doctor. You could have preclampsia. Which makes your blood pressure high, protien in your pee,and extreme swelling

I drink a lot of water and for some reason I hate salt it's like it stands out so much to me since I've become pregnant and I called her just feel like they get annoyed if you call and I have asked her about the preeclampsia last week bc I was like this but it's gotten worse but my blood pressure isn't something she would worry about she said but maybe she will have something to say now since it's still happening.
How far along are you? If you are more than 20wks go to the er. It could be sign of preclampsia and that's nothing to play with. It can kill you and baby!!!
Call your dr. Or go to the er you want to be on the safe side.
I called my doctor and she didn't seem to be worried but I am.
Sounds like Preeclamsia and yeah you should be worried preeclamsia is one of the main causes for stillbirth. Dont let your doctor just tell you is ok make sure you get it checked out pleass dont wait

question: My whole body is swollen which is normal but it's been two days, and for two days now my feet and hands. Have been swollen I hate bothering my doctor because I feel like I'm bothering her and she thinks I'm just being annoying but I'm kinda getting nervous.
title: is there a reason for this?
